"De Marmoth Meat":
"That Marmoth meat you got for me is proving to
be wildly popular. It's so tender, probably because
it came from such a young specimen. I bet the
meat from a De Marmoth, the adult form, would
be much firmer, just like the crew likes it. So De
Marmoth meat it is! Oh, are you going to make me
say it? All right then. I want you to go get me some
De Marmoth meat. Pretty please?

*Target: De Marmoths level 31 or higher"

"マルモスの肉の評判は上々よ！
やっぱり幼生体ってのもあって
すごく肉質が柔らかいみたい！
成体であるデ・マルモスの肉は
これに比べてもっと歯応えがあって
ジューシーなんだと思うわ！
ということで、デ・マルモスの肉！
うん、予想してたでしょ？
取ってきてほしいの！　お願いっ！
※Lv.31～のデ・マルモスが対象"
